name: Layover (zoped)
description:
Bobby Radish is a businessman extraordinaire on a path to closing the juiciest deal of his life. 
 Not even ten connecting flights at Labyrinth Intl. and twenty Martinis at the business lounge will stop him on his quest to capitalize. 
 Battle through phone talking folk blocking the walkways and hungry security agents looking to confiscate your shampoo in a suspiciously melty airport terminal...


WASD - MoveE - Interact
